title: What's the Secret to Making My Wife Happy?
description:
Garrett is frustrated that no matter what he tries, he can't get the connection and intimacy he wants with his wife. - Dr. Laura: "Rebuild your connection by giving tenderness without expecting it to lead to sex."

Is your marriage in the place you'd like it to be? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram

Twitter.com/DrLauraProgram

YouTube.com/DrLaura

Become a Dr. Laura Family Member: https://www.drlaura.com/ See https://www.drlaura.com/privacy-policy for privacy information.
